original_text:
Gaelic Gold
La slot Gaelic Gold è alimentata da Nolimit City e si gioca con 3 rulli e da 5 a 9 linee di pagamento. Disponibile per giocare a partire da soli 0,05€ per giro su tutti i dispositivi, questo gioco irlandese a tema fortunato è dotato di un wild in espansione che aumenta il moltiplicatore ad ogni gomitata. La funzione Rainbow Spins ti permette di scegliere tra le monete per aggiungere linee di pagamento extra, vincere più giri gratis e aumentare il moltiplicatore.
Una grafica irlandese
In Irlanda c’è sempre il sole, soprattutto se si tratta di una visita virtuale in compagnia di una slot machine online come Gaelic Gold; questa avventura irlandese è sviluppata da Nolimit City e tenta i giocatori con i folletti selvaggi e Rainbow Spins.Gaelic Gold è una slot a tre rulli con tre file e cinque linee di pagamento fisse; un’ordinata cornice d’oro circonda questi rulli, decorati con quadrifogli a quattro foglie che mostrano le linee di pagamento. Campi, fiumi e un arcobaleno in un cielo blu completano l’allegra scena.
La fessura d’oro gaelico ha un tema di fortuna irlandese. Con la bella campagna irlandese sullo sfondo, vedrete un arcobaleno in cima. Colorati e con una grafica in stile cartoon ad alta definizione, noterete un flauto che suona un flauto mentre aprite la slot. Piove anche, cosa tipica del clima irlandese!
I simboli includono A, K, Q e J royals – vedrete anche cappelli da folletto, scarpe da folletto, pinte di stout, fortunati ferri di cavallo dorati e quadrifogli dorati. Quest’ultimo paga 15 volte la tua puntata per 3 in combinazione. Il folletto è il simbolo selvatico e sostituisce tutti i simboli menzionati. Il pagamento dal Wild è lo stesso del trifoglio a 4 foglie d’oro (15 x puntata per 3).
I simboli a tema sono un quadrifoglio dorato, un ferro di cavallo, un boccale di birra spumeggiante, la scarpa del folletto e il suo cappello a cilindro. Il folletto stesso è il Wild, appare in tre posizioni in alto sui rulli e sostituirà tutti i simboli standard per contribuire a realizzare combo vincenti. La pentola d’oro è il simbolo del bonus.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Gaelic Gold beneficia di un simbolo xNudge Wild (un folletto completamente espanso). Questo simbolo wild a 3 file alte può apparire sui rulli 1, 2 e 3, e si spinge sempre per riempire completamente il rullo.
Ogni nudge innesca la funzione xNudge Wild e aumenta il moltiplicatore di 1. È possibile atterrare più moltiplicatori wild contemporaneamente con il moltiplicatore wild che si combina per un grande moltiplicatore.
L’altro simbolo importante è il simbolo del Pot of Gold Bonus. Quando appare in posizione centrale sulla bobina 2 (la bobina centrale), si attiva la funzione Rainbow Spins. Riceverai un minimo di 5 giri gratuiti.
Prima dell’inizio dei giri liberi, è possibile aggiungere ulteriori modificatori scegliendo tra le 9 monete. È garantito il prelievo di almeno 1 moneta. Questi includono:
Giri extra: si possono aggiungere fino a 25 giri gratuiti per ogni moneta;
Linee arcobaleno: si tratta di 2 linee arcobaleno aggiuntive per moneta;
Moltiplicatore di vincita extra: ti dà un aumento del moltiplicatore fino a 5x per moneta
Se si atterra un xNudge Wild durante la funzione, il moltiplicatore aumenterà il moltiplicatore. Questo moltiplicatore wild viene moltiplicato per il moltiplicatore di vittoria con cui si gioca nella funzione Rainbow Spins.
Il modificatore Rainbow Lines è particolarmente utile in quanto si può giocare con 9 linee di vincita rispetto alle 5 standard. Il modificatore più significativo è il Moltiplicatore di Vittoria Extra, poiché il moltiplicatore può salire molto in alto.
Si può giocare al gioco di ispirazione irlandese a partire da soli 0,05€ a giro – per i giocatori con tasche più profonde, si può giocare con fino a 100€ a giro. Con una modalità a velocità fulminea disponibile, c’è una funzione Autoplay in cui si sceglie tra 10 e 1.000 giri.
Potete fermarla quando una singola vittoria supera un importo a vostra scelta, se il vostro equilibrio è inferiore ad un certo importo o se è superiore ad un certo importo. Questo vi permette di giocare d’azzardo in modo responsabile se necessario.
Varianza medio-alta (8/10 secondo Nolimit City), l’RTP si attesta al 96,15%, che è più o meno giusto per una slot online. Il payout massimo è di 9.837 x la vostra puntata, con la maggior parte delle vittorie in arrivo nel gioco base. Le vincite più grandi verranno dalla funzione Rainbow Spins, ma ci vorranno in media 127 giri per innescarla.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se vuoi giocare una Slot Machine con un tema simile e vuoi assicurarti vincite maggiori, ti diciamo che l’unico gioco irlandese a tema fortunato con vittorie maggiori è Rainbow Riches Megaways di Barcrest. Questa versione ha 6 rulli e fino a 117.649 modi di vincere.

raw_translation.response:
Gaelic Gold, powered by Nolimit City, boasts 3 reels and 5 to 9 pay lines. This lucky Irish-themed game is available to play on all devices from just €0.05 per spin, featuring an expanding wild that increases the multiplier with each spin. The Rainbow Spins feature allows you to choose between coins to add extra pay lines, win more free spins and increase the multiplier. 

The graphics of Gaelic Gold take you on a virtual visit through the beautiful countryside of Ireland. The sunny background and an overlooking rainbow sets the perfect tone for this exciting game. With high-definition cartoon graphics, a flute playing in the background, and typical Irish weather, this game is sure to give expert gamblers an unforgettable experience. 

Symbols include A, K, Q, and J royals, as well as leprechaun hats, shoes, pints of stout, gold horseshoes, and gold clovers. The latter pays 15 times your bet for 3 in combination. The leprechaun is the wild symbol and replaces all mentioned symbols. The Wild payout is the same as the 4-leaf gold clover (15 x bet for 3). 

Gaelic Gold features the xNudge Wild symbol, a fully expanded leprechaun. This 3-row high wild symbol can appear on reels 1, 2, and 3, and always nudges to fully fill the reel. Every nudge triggers the xNudge Wild feature and increases the multiplier by 1. It’s possible to land more wild multipliers simultaneously, combining for a big multiplier. 

The other important symbol is the Pot of Gold Bonus symbol. When it appears in the central position on reel 2 (the middle reel), the Rainbow Spins function is activated. You will receive a minimum of 5 free spins. Before the start of the free spins, you can add additional modifiers by choosing between the 9 coins. At least 1 coin withdrawal is guaranteed, including extra spins and additional rainbow lines. The most significant modifier is the Extra Win Multiplier, as the multiplier can go very high. 

You can play this Irish-inspired game from just €0.05 per spin. For players with deeper pockets, you can play up to €100 per spin. With a lightning-fast mode available, there's an autoplay feature where you choose between 10 and 1,000 spins. You can stop it when a single win exceeds a certain amount, if your balance is below a certain amount or if it is above a certain amount. 

Gaelic Gold has a medium to high variance (8/10 according to Nolimit City), and the RTP is 96.15%, which is fair for an online slot. The maximum payout is 9,837 times your bet, with the majority of wins coming in the base game. The biggest wins will come from the Rainbow Spins feature, but it will take an average of 127 spins to trigger it. 

For players looking for a similar theme with bigger wins, the only other lucky Irish-themed game with bigger payouts is Rainbow Riches Megaways by Barcrest. This version has 6 reels and up to 117,649 ways to win, providing expert gamblers with another thrilling option.

Gaelic Gold is a slot game powered by Nolimit City, featuring 3 reels and 5-9 paylines. Starting at just €0.05 per spin across all devices, this lucky Irish-themed game boasts an expanding wild that increases the multiplier with every spin. The Rainbow Spins feature lets you choose between coins to add extra paylines, win more free spins, and increase the multiplier.

With an Irish countryside backdrop and a rainbow above, Gaelic Gold transports you on a virtual visit to the emerald isle. This Nolimit City adventure entices players with wild leprechauns and Rainbow Spins. The game has 3 reels, 3 rows, and 5 fixed paylines. The orderly golden frame surrounds the reels and is decorated with four-leaf clovers that show the paylines. Fields, rivers, and a blue sky rainbow complete the cheerful scene.

Symbols include royal cards A, K, Q, and J – as well as leprechaun hats and shoes, pints of stout, lucky golden horseshoes, and golden four-leaf clovers. The latter pays 15 times your bet for 3 in combination. The leprechaun is the wild symbol and replaces all the standard symbols to help form winning combinations. The payout from the wild is the same as the golden four-leaf clover (15 x bet for 3).

The theme symbols consist of a golden clover, a horseshoe, a frothy beer tankard, leprechaun’s shoes and top hat. The leprechaun himself is the Wild, appearing in three positions at the top of the reels and will substitute for all standard symbols to help form winning combos. The pot of gold is the bonus symbol.

Gaelic Gold benefits from an xNudge Wild symbol (a fully expanded leprechaun). This 3-row high wild symbol can appear on reels 1, 2, and 3 and always nudges to fill the entire reel.

Each nudge triggers the xNudge Wild feature and increases the multiplier by 1. It is possible to land multiple wild multipliers simultaneously with the wild multiplier combining for a big multiplier.

The other important symbol is the Pot of Gold Bonus symbol. When it appears in the central position on reel 2 (the middle reel), the Rainbow Spins feature is activated. You'll receive a minimum of 5 free spins.

Before the free spins commence, it is possible to add further modifiers by choosing from the 9 coins. You are guaranteed to pick up at least 1 coin. These include: Extra spins – up to 25 free spins can be added per coin; Rainbow lines – these are 2 additional rainbow lines per coin; Extra win multiplier – gives you a win multiplier increase up to 5x per coin.

If an xNudge Wild is landed during the feature, the multiplier will increase. This wild multiplier is multiplied by the win multiplier you are playing with in the Rainbow Spins feature.

The Rainbow Lines modifier is particularly useful as you can play with 9 paylines instead of the standard 5. The most significant modifier is the Extra Win Multiplier, as the multiplier can soar very high.

You can play this Irish-inspired game starting at just €0.05 per spin – for players with deeper pockets, you can play with up to €100 per spin. With a lightning fast mode available, there is an Autoplay feature where you choose between 10 and 1,000 spins.

You can stop it when a single win exceeds a chosen amount, if your balance is less than a certain amount, or if it's greater than a certain amount. This allows you to gamble responsibly if necessary.

Medium-high variance (8/10 according to Nolimit City), the RTP is 96.15%, which is fair for an online slot. The maximum payout is 9,837 x your bet, with most wins coming in the base game. The biggest wins will come from the Rainbow Spins feature, but it will take an average of 127 spins to trigger it.

Similar slot games include Rainbow Riches Megaways by Barcrest. This version has 6 reels and up to 117,649 ways to win for even bigger wins. Get ready for the luck of the Irish to shine upon you with Gaelic Gold!

The orderly golden frame surrounds the reels and is decorated with four-leaf clovers that show the paylines. Fields, rivers, and a blue sky rainbow complete the cheerful scene.

Symbols include royal cards A, K, Q, and J – as well as leprechaun hats and shoes, pints of stout, lucky golden horseshoes, and golden four-leaf clovers. The latter pays 15 times your bet for 3 in combination. The leprechaun is the wild symbol and replaces all the standard symbols to help form winning combinations. The payout from the wild is the same as the golden four-leaf clover (15 x bet for 3).

The theme symbols consist of a golden clover, a horseshoe, a frothy beer tankard, leprechaun’s shoes and top hat. The leprechaun himself is the Wild, appearing in three positions at the top of the reels and will substitute for all standard symbols to help form winning combos. The pot of gold is the bonus symbol.

Gaelic Gold benefits from an xNudge Wild symbol (a fully expanded leprechaun). This 3-row high wild symbol can appear on reels 1, 2, and 3 and always nudges to fill the entire reel.

Each nudge triggers the xNudge Wild feature and increases the multiplier by 1. It is possible to land multiple wild multipliers simultaneously with the wild multiplier combining for a big multiplier.

The other important symbol is the Pot of Gold Bonus symbol. When it appears in the central position on reel 2 (the middle reel), the Rainbow Spins feature is activated. You'll receive a minimum of 5 free spins.

Before the free spins commence, it is possible to add further modifiers by choosing from the 9 coins. You are guaranteed to pick up at least 1 coin. These include: Extra spins – up to 25 free spins can be added per coin; Rainbow lines – these are 2 additional rainbow lines per coin; Extra win multiplier – gives you a win multiplier increase up to 5x per coin.

If an xNudge Wild is landed during the feature, the multiplier will increase. This wild multiplier is multiplied by the win multiplier you are playing with in the Rainbow Spins feature.

The Rainbow Lines modifier is particularly useful as you can play with 9 paylines instead of the standard 5. The most significant modifier is the Extra Win Multiplier, as the multiplier can soar very high.

You can play this Irish-inspired game starting at just €0.05 per spin – for players with deeper pockets, you can play with up to €100 per spin. With a lightning fast mode available, there is an Autoplay feature where you choose between 10 and 1,000 spins.

You can stop it when a single win exceeds a chosen amount, if your balance is less than a certain amount, or if it's greater than a certain amount. This allows you to gamble responsibly if necessary.

Medium-high variance (8/10 according to Nolimit City), the RTP is 96.15%, which is fair for an online slot. The maximum payout is 9,837 x your bet, with most wins coming in the base game. The biggest wins will come from the Rainbow Spins feature, but it will take an average of 127 spins to trigger it.

Similar slot games include Rainbow Riches Megaways by Barcrest. This version has 6 reels and up to 117,649 ways to win for even bigger wins. Get ready for the luck of the Irish to shine upon you with Gaelic Gold!
